alert.note: Alert for Oregon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:35PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Oregon County through 815 PM CDT... At 735 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Alton, or 14 miles north of Thayer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alton around 755 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Thomasville, Wilderness and Greer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
